item.title: 招聘人员称，英国就业市场趋于稳定，工资水平有所下降
item.description: 一项备受关注的调查显示，英国上个月的工资几乎没有增长，这将为英国央行提供更多关于通胀压力正在缓解的信心。【原文：UK wages barely grew last month, according to a closely watched survey that will offer the Bank of England more confidence that inflationary pressures are easing.】

item.title: 玻利维亚新任中央银行行长承诺恢复独立性
item.description: 玻利维亚新任央行行长戴维-埃斯皮诺萨（David Espinoza）周四下午在拉巴斯政府宫举行的宣誓就职仪式上承诺，将恢复货币管理机构严格的技术性和独立性。【原文：Bolivia’s new central bank president David Espinoza pledged to restore a strictly technical and independent approach from the monetary authority during his swearing-in ceremony Thursday afternoon at the government palace in La Paz.】

item.title: Amtrak 告诉纽约 MTA，它将向一些地铁-北方线路开放
item.description: 美国国家客运铁路公司（Amtrak）在致纽约大都会运输局的一封信中表示，该公司愿意在 2027 年之前在纽约宾夕法尼亚车站增加有限的 Metro-North 铁路服务，但需要减少开往该车站的长岛铁路列车。【原文：Amtrak is open to adding limited Metro-North Railroad service into New York City’s Penn Station by 2027, but there would need to be fewer Long Island Rail Road trains into that station, the national passenger rail said in a letter to the Metropolitan Transportation Authority.】

item.title: 日本国内生产总值（GDP）可能出现下滑，这可能会促使人们呼吁大幅增加财政支出
item.description: 日本经济在今年夏天可能出现了两年来最大幅度的萎缩，周一公布的数据将为首相高市真奈提供一些潜在的理由，以制定一个庞大的经济方案。【原文：Japan’s economy likely shrank by the most in two years over the summer, with figures out Monday poised to offer Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi some potential justification for compiling a hefty economic package.】

item.title: OpenAI、苹果因竞争问题败诉马斯克xAI诉讼案
item.description: 德克萨斯州一名联邦法官裁定，苹果公司和 OpenAI 必须对埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司和 xAI 提起的诉讼做出回应，该诉讼指控这两家公司合谋阻挠人工智能新兴市场的竞争。【原文：Apple Inc. and OpenAI must answer to a lawsuit filed by Elon Musk’s X Corp. and xAI accusing the companies of conspiring to thwart competition in emerging markets in artificial intelligence, a federal judge in Texas ruled.】

item.title: 受降息疑虑影响，黄金五日来首次下跌后保持稳定
item.description: 黄金在经历了五天来的首次下跌后开盘持稳，在美国政府结束停摆后，降息预期随之减弱。【原文：Gold opened steady after its first decline in five days, with expectations dwindling that an interest-rate cut will follow hot on the heels of the US government’s return from shutdown.】

item.title: 森松国际、Steel Dynamics 成为 Sohn Australia 首选企业
item.description: 在悉尼举行的 Sohn Australia 会议上，一家中国设备制造商和一家美国钢铁生产商被看好。【原文：A Chinese equipment maker and a US steel producer have been tipped as stock favorites at the Sohn Australia conference in Sydney.】

item.title: 嘉能可称即将就美国合规漏洞达成和解
item.description: Canaccord Genuity 集团表示，该公司即将与美国当局就其在美国的非核心交易业务存在的合规漏洞达成广泛和解，并已预留 7500 万美元用于支付预期的罚款。【原文：Canaccord Genuity Group Inc. said it’s nearing a broad settlement with US authorities stemming from compliance gaps at its non-core trading businesses in the country and has set aside a total of $75 million to cover anticipated penalties.】

item.title: 秘鲁维持关键利率不变，通胀进一步放缓，低于目标值
item.description: 在新兴市场中通货膨胀率最低的国家之一进一步降温之后，秘鲁将借贷成本维持在三年来的最低水平。【原文：Peru held borrowing costs at a three-year low after one of the lowest inflation rates in emerging markets cooled even further.】

item.title: 莫迪的 "印度制造 "雄心与崛起的 "千人经济 "发生冲突
item.description:
印度的增长有赖于在不失去推动经济繁荣的工人的情况下建设工厂。【原文：

India’s growth depends on building factories without losing the workers powering its gig boom.

】

item.title: 摩根大通称，买入 CATL 深圳股票，卖出香港同业股票
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Buy Contemporary Amperex Technology Co.’s Shenzhen-traded shares and sell their Hong Kong-listed peers, as the expiry of a sales ban on some early key investors approaches, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 菲律宾坚挺的贷款利率削弱了中央银行减息的影响
item.description: 自去年以来，菲律宾中央银行已将其关键政策利率下调了近两个百分点，降至 4.75%，但该国顶级银行的住房贷款价格几乎没有变动。【原文：The Philippine central bank has slashed its key policy rate by almost two percentage points to 4.75% since last year, but the price of a home loan from the nation’s top banks has barely budged.】

item.title: 报告称美国数据中心的灵活用电是虚构的
item.description: 一份新的报告指出，数据中心可以在需求高峰期关闭，而不需要建设发电厂，这一概念可能会给公用事业客户带来数十亿美元的损失。【原文：The idea that data centers can shut down during peak demand times — not requiring the buildout of power plants — is a concept that could cost utility customers billions of dollars, according to a new report.】

item.title: 美联储降息疑云浮现，亚洲股市下跌：市场综述
item.description: 周五，亚洲股市追随华尔街走低，因为利率和股票估值的不确定性削弱了与美国政府重开有关的乐观情绪。【原文：Asian stocks were primed to track Wall Street lower Friday, as optimism linked to the US government reopening was tempered by uncertainty over interest rates and equity valuations.】

item.title: 各州数据显示美国上周初请失业金人数有所减少
item.description: 彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）对未经调整的各州申请数据进行的分析显示，上周美国失业救济金申请人数有所减少。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits edged lower last week, according to a Bloomberg News analysis of unadjusted state-level filings.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利就金矿公司香港首次公开募股问题接受国会议员质询
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正面临美国众议院中国委员会共和党负责人的审查，审查该行在 9 月份承销紫金黄金国际股份有限公司（Zijin Gold International Co.【原文：Morgan Stanley is facing scrutiny from the Republican head of the US House China committee over whether the bank performed enough due diligence in underwriting the $3.7 billion Hong Kong initial public offering of Zijin Gold International Co. in September.】

item.title: 美联储降息希望渺茫，市场避险情绪高涨
item.description: 由于美国政府关门，美联储政策制定者无法获得关键数据，他们只能盲目行事，这种不确定性正在考验投资者的神经。【原文：Federal Reserve policymakers are flying blind after the US government shutdown starved them of crucial data, and the uncertainty is testing the nerves of investors.】

item.title: 香蕉对关税和通货膨胀的启示
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 应用材料公司销售额下降，预计 2026 年将出现反弹
item.description: 应用材料公司（Applied Materials Inc.【原文：Applied Materials Inc. suffered a sales decline last quarter and predicted another drop in the current period, though the chip-equipment maker sees demand improving in the second half of 2026.】

item.title: 塑造播客行业的人眼中的播客行业现状
item.description:
行业领导者对从 Netflix 的中庸诱惑到人工智能值得商榷的影响等各种问题进行了权衡

。【原文：

Industry leaders weigh in on everything from the middling allure of Netflix to the debatable impact of AI

】

item.title: 在人工智能信贷 "过剩 "之际，橡树看到了资产支持债券的价值
item.description: 随着企业信贷需求的飙升，橡树资本管理公司发现了房地产和混合债务的价值。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management is finding value in real estate and hybrid debt as demand for corporate credit soars.】

item.title: 纽瓦克机场改造取决于价值 450 亿美元的港务局计划
item.description: 作为纽约和新泽西港务局周四公布的拟议 450 亿美元基本建设计划的一部分，纽瓦克自由国际机场预计将进行大修。【原文：Newark Liberty International Airport is expected to get a major facelift as part of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey’s proposed $45 billion capital plan released Thursday.】

item.title: 日本航空公司在地区机队大修中寻求多达 70 架喷气机
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本航空公司（Japan Airlines Co., Ltd.）已向制造商征集多达 70 架支线飞机和涡轮螺旋桨飞机的计划书，以替换服务于大都市以外地区的国内机队。【原文：Japan Airlines Co. has sought proposals from manufacturers for up to 70 regional and turboprop aircraft to replace a domestic fleet that services areas outside major metropolitan regions, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 穆拉提的思维机器公司正在进行价值 500 亿美元的融资谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由 OpenAI 前高管米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）创办的人工智能初创公司 Thinking Machines Lab 正在进行新一轮融资的早期谈判，估值约为 500 亿美元。【原文：Thinking Machines Lab, an artificial intelligence startup founded by former OpenAI executive Mira Murati, is in early talks to raise a new round of funding at a roughly $50 billion valuation, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西门子能源发布涡轮机和数据中心需求展望
item.description: 由于燃气轮机和数据中心设备的需求以及 Gamesa 风力涡轮机部门的重组进展，西门子能源股份公司大幅上调了中期财务目标。【原文：Siemens Energy AG substantially hiked its mid-term financial targets on the back of demand for gas turbines and data center equipment as well as restructuring progress in its Gamesa wind turbine unit.】

item.title: 美国可转债以 1,090 亿美元的规模刷新科威德纪录
item.description: 最近几个月的新一轮交易浪潮推动美国可转换债券市场今年的交易量创下新高，甚至超过了大流行病时期的狂热活动。【原文：A fresh wave of deals in recent months has propelled the US convertible market to record volume this year, eclipsing even the pandemic-era frenzy of activity.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利不支持上一次减息，对 12 月份的减息举棋不定
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，他不支持美国央行上一次降息，尽管他仍未决定在 12 月份的政策会议上采取何种最佳行动方案。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari said he didn’t support the US central bank’s last interest-rate cut, though he’s still undecided on the best course of action for its December policy meeting.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）考虑就代币化存款保险制定指导意见
item.description: 美国联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.【原文：The head of the Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. said the regulator is working on guidance for tokenized deposit insurance, a move that would help steer financial institutions that want to broaden their footprint in digital assets.】

item.title: 比特币跌破 100,000 美元，熊市笼罩加密货币
item.description: 在新一轮避险情绪和科技股大跌重燃华尔街恐慌情绪的拖累下，比特币进一步跌破 100,000 美元大关。【原文：Bitcoin sank deeper below the $100,000 mark, dragged down by a fresh wave of risk aversion and a selloff in tech stocks that reignited Wall Street jitters.】

item.title: 日本芯片业财报显示人工智能需求旺盛，汽车业不景气
item.description: 随着数据中心需求的激增，芯片制造商和设备供应商纷纷上调业绩预期，人工智能推动日本科技行业实现了超预期的盈利。【原文：Artificial intelligence fueled a stronger-than-expected earnings season for Japan’s tech sector, with surging data-center demand prompting chipmakers and equipment suppliers to raise forecasts.】
